channel.title: Emotions on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Emotions on mattischrome

item.title: The Negativity Casket
item.description: One of the things that people tend to start around this time of year is a diary. They usually get filled for as long as your new year’s resolutions last. However, I’ve been writing in my current diary for a while. It’s a Moleskine extra large ruled Notebook in beautiful Prussian Blue, covered in whatever stickers pass over my desk. (Hint: find my address and send me stickers Internet.) This is much more preferable to a ‘real’ diary because I can leave a few days and then resume.
